faqs.question: Does supermarket and restaurant pay together?
faqs.answer: No. You have to pay separately.

faqs.question: What if I cannot find what I want?
faqs.answer: You can submite an inquiry form and we'll response within two business days. If many people inquiry an item, we may consider add it to our store.

faqs.question: What are discounts in the shopping cart?
faqs.answer: Currently you will get a 50% discounts on all of our items. Enjoy shopping!
